title: Suuri Kalliojärvi
description: A serene lake surrounded by rugged rock formations and pine forest, Suuri Kalliojärvi offers peaceful short hiking route around it in the heart of North Karelia’s wild nature..

title: Karhutunturi
description: A peaceful fell rising from the taiga near the Russian border, Karhutunturi provides quiet hiking routes through rolling hills, boreal forest, and wide vistas typical of eastern Lapland.

title: Ruunaanjärvi
description: A tranquil lake at the heart of the Ruunaa area, Ruunaanjärvi is ideal for canoeing and fishing, with easy access to wilderness trails and scenic camping spots along its shores

title: Ruunaa
description: A popular outdoor destination featuring white-water rapids, forest trails, and accessible wilderness, Ruunaa offers exciting canoeing adventures and hiking in untouched river landscapes.

title: Ruunaa
description: A popular outdoor destination featuring white-water rapids, forest trails, and accessible wilderness, Ruunaa offers exciting canoeing adventures and hiking in untouched river landscapes.

title: Patvinsuo
description: Known for its vast mires, old-growth forests, and clear lakes, Patvinsuo is a haven for birdwatchers, hikers, and canoeists looking to experience Finland’s diverse wetland ecosystems.
